board.constraint: Bias newest info; Node>=18; reuse goldens; reversible steps; no heavy deps today.

chat: TTao: Problem: (unset). Let's keep it green and simple.
Thread Sovereign: Decide. Strike the decisive seam. (Sun Tzu: win without fighting) Daily health + one reversible improvement. Ship only if frozen stays green. OODA (observe–orient–decide–act).

Faultline Seeker: I'll run a quick probe: Design 1–3 micro-tests for riskiest assumption in Board; run replay on a new short trace. If we don't see Stop rule hit (signal or timeout) on at least one probe, we stop and regroup.
Prism Magus: Same aim, new path: Use an adapter, not a rewrite. Calls it good when demo works today.
Web Cartographer: Map says: Adopt ports/adapters for the next seam; land the smallest first step — smallest step first. (Entrypoint scan: seed from README/index/H1)

exploit.persona: I cut indecision; we move one safe step.

explore.persona: I probe the crack that breaks assumptions fastest.

pivot.persona: I change the path, not the goal; I turn complicated into constrained.

reorient.persona: I reveal the map so we can choose a better path.
